Commands.Summon Moonstone: Summons 「Moonstone」 for 6 turns  Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 6 turns  Raises BRV based on Initial BRV  No Action Delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count   While 「Moonstone」 is active:  - Grants 「Small Max BRV Up」 and 「BRV Damage Reduction」 effects to the party  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「Sic」 and 「HP Attack」 to 「Shining Moonstone」  - 「Moonstone」 disappears if its owner is broken   「Moonstone」 is summoned for 6 turns when the Quests starts
Commands.Sic: 2-HIT magic BRV attack  Raises party's BRV based on Initial BRV
Commands.Shining Moonstone: Raises BRV based on Initial BRV before inflicting a 1-HIT magic BRV+HP attack
Commands.Energy Drain: 2-HIT magic BRV+HP attack  Restores HP based on HP damage dealt up to 10% Max HP
Commands.BRV Regen All: Grants 「BRV Regen」 to the party for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Summon Moonstone Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using  Summon Moonstone
Passives.Buff Base: Slightly raises Initial BRV while buffed
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Energy Drain Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Energy Drain
Passives.Aetherflow: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed: Moderately raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Summon Moonstone Extend: When the Quest starts:- Grants  Small Max BRV Up  for 6 turnsWhen using  Summon Moonstone :- Raises party's BRV based on Initial BRVWhen using  Sic :- Moderately raises BRV potencyWhen using  Shining Moonstone :- Increases number of BRV hits to 2- Moderately raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Passives.Buff Base&Attack: Moderately raises Initial BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Energy Drain Extend: When using  Energy Drain :- Increases number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt up to 10% of their Max HP
Passives.Resonance of Bravery and Power: Raises party's Initial BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.BRV Regen All Extend: When using  BRV Regen All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party's Initial BRV

Weapons.The Veil of Wiyu CP: 15: When using  Summon Moonstone ,  Sic ,  Shining Moonstone :- Raises the BRV gain based on Initial BRV
Weapons.Almandal CP: 35: When using  Energy Drain :- Raises BRV potency- Raises the HP recovery limit- Raises HP recovered based on HP damage dealt- Upon recovering HP, if the healing amount exceeds the target's Max HP, excess is converted to BRV
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: BRV Regen All  use +1Duration of  BRV Regen All  effects +2 turns
